details.title: Loss from Approximations to Square-Law Detectors in Quadrature Systems with Postdetection Integration
details.abstract: The trend toward digital processing of radar and sonar signals has ledto the use of Â¿basebandÂ¿ or bipolar video signals. The processingof both the in-phase (I) and quadrature (Q) channels generally allows an exact representation of the signals, and no loss of sensitivity need occur. However, for reasons of economy or weight only one channel is often implemented. This correspondence shows that the sensitivity loss for this case often deviates considerably from the 3-dB rule of thumb.
